mapper.insert: insert into review (rev_num, pay_num, gds_num, gds_name,ord_gdsoption, mem_num, mem_id, rev_content, rev_date,rev_filename,ol_num) values (#{rev_num}, #{pay_num}, #{gds_num}, #{gds_name}, #{ord_gdsoption}, #{mem_num},#{mem_id},#{rev_content}, sysdate(),#{rev_filename},#{ol_num})
mapper.select: select count(rev_num) from review where mem_num=#{mem_num}

select r.rev_num, r.pay_num, r.gds_num, r.gds_name, r.ord_gdsoption, r.mem_num, r.mem_id, r.rev_content, r.rev_date, r.rev_filename, r.ol_num, g.gds_thumbnail, p.opt_1stname, p.opt_1stval, p.opt_2ndname, p.opt_2ndval from project.review r left JOIN project.goods g on r.gds_num = g.gds_num left JOIN project.option p on r.ord_gdsoption = p.opt_num where r.mem_num = #{mem_num} group by rev_num order by rev_num desc limit #{pageIndex}, 5
